## Maintenance Guidelines
Thank you for reporting a maintenance task! Our guidelines:
- Maintenance tasks are prioritized based on impact and urgency
- Critical maintenance may be scheduled immediately
- Regular maintenance windows are typically scheduled during low-traffic periods
- All maintenance requires proper testing and documentation
- Team coordination is required for system-impacting maintenance
